hero.title: Rural Telemedicine
hero.subtitle: Bringing quality healthcare to your village

teleconsultation.title: Teleconsultation
teleconsultation.description: Video calls optimized for low bandwidth with simple room joining. Connect with doctors from anywhere, even with limited internet.

healthRecords.title: Health Records
healthRecords.description: Store your medical history securely and access it anytime. Download PDF reports for offline access or to share with other healthcare providers.

medicineTracker.title: Medicine Tracker
medicineTracker.description: Check real-time availability of medicines at local pharmacies. Get notified when essential medications are back in stock.

mission.title: Connecting Rural Communities to Quality Healthcare
mission.description: Our platform provides low-bandwidth teleconsultations, digital health records, and real-time medicine availability tracking designed specifically for rural communities with limited connectivity.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Comprehensive healthcare solutions tailored for rural communities

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: Making healthcare accessible across rural communities

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who are already benefiting from our telemedicine platform. Start your healthcare journey today.

footer.copyright: © {{year}} Rural Telemedicine. All rights reserved. Built with ❤️ for rural communities.

symptomChecker.title: AI Symptom Checker
symptomChecker.description: Get AI-powered medical assistance by describing your symptoms, uploading images, or attaching relevant documents.
symptomChecker.attachmentNote: For PDF files, processing is limited. For better results, use images.
symptomChecker.pdfWarning: Note: PDF processing is limited. For better results, use images whenever possible.
symptomChecker.emptyInput: Please provide at least some text or upload an image/attachment.
symptomChecker.apiKeyError: API key is missing. Please configure it in the .env file.
symptomChecker.apiUnauthorized: Unauthorized: Please check your API key.
symptomChecker.rateLimit: Rate limit exceeded: Please try again later.
symptomChecker.noResponse: No valid response from AI service.

prompts.medicalAssistance: You are a healthcare AI assistant. Analyze the user's symptoms and provide information about possible conditions. Always include a disclaimer that this is not a substitute for professional medical advice and recommend consulting a doctor for a proper diagnosis.
prompts.prescriptionReader: You are a healthcare AI assistant. Read the prescription and provide information about the medication, dosage, and instructions. Always include a disclaimer that this is not a substitute for professional medical advice and recommend consulting a doctor or pharmacist for clarification.
prompts.medicineDescriber: You are a healthcare AI assistant. Describe the medication, its uses, side effects, and precautions. Always include a disclaimer that this is not a substitute for professional medical advice and recommend consulting a doctor or pharmacist for personalized information.
prompts.reportAnalyzer: You are a healthcare AI assistant. Analyze the medical report and explain the findings in simple terms. Always include a disclaimer that this is not a substitute for professional medical advice and recommend consulting a doctor for a full explanation.
prompts.default: You are a healthcare AI assistant. Provide information based on the user's input. Always include a disclaimer that this is not a substitute for professional medical advice and recommend consulting a doctor for personalized guidance.
